Mayor

Mayor

Message from the Mayor

Thank you to the citizens of Crockett for giving me the opportunity to serve as your Mayor. I look forward to working with the Council and City Hall to bring peace and prosperity to the City of Crockett.

Ianthia Fisher

The City Mayor is elected at-large to a two year term.

The mayor shall preside at meetings of the city council and shall be recognized as head of the city government for all ceremonial purposes and by the governor for purposes of martial law but shall have no regular administrative duties. The mayor shall have no vote except in case of a tie vote and shall have no veto power. The mayor pro tem shall act as mayor during the absence or disability of the mayor.
